name: Castle Chess (draconicQueer, FloppyFishStudios)
description:
Castle Chess is a local multiplayer competitive strategy game for two players, using a series of chess mini-games, complicated by rule variations and power up cards, to determine the ultimate victor

Created by Lexi Scott, Morgan Gillaspie, Harry Kwon, Cameron Byrne, Josie Tucker, and Sarthak Shah, at Case Western Reserve University
